sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect} from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Header from "./../components/Header"; import { PayPalButton } from "react-paypal-button-v2"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { getOrderDetails } from "../Redux/Actions/OrderActions"; import Loading from './../components/LoadingError/Loading'; import Message from './../components/LoadingError/Error'; import moment from 'moment'; const OrderScreen = ({ match }) => { window.scrollTo(0, 0); const id = localStorage.getItem("orderDetails") const val = JSON.parse(id) console.log(id+"id") console.log(val+"val") console.log(val._id) const orderId = val._id console.log(match.params.id) const dispatch = useDispatch(); const orderDetails = useSelector((state)=> state.orderDetails); const { order, loading, error} = orderDetails; // Calculate Price const addDecimals = (num) => { return (Math.round(num * 100) / 100).toFixed(2); }; order.itemsPrice = addDecimals( order.orderItems.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.price * item.qty, 0) ); useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(getOrderDetails(val._id)) },[dispatch, orderId]) console.log(orderId+"hah") return ( <>
{ loading ? ( ) : error ? ({error}) : ( <>
Customer

{order.user.name}

{order.user.email}

{/* 2 */}
Order info

Shipping: {order.shippingAddress.country}

Pay method: {order.paymentMethod}

{ order.isPaid ? (

Paid on {moment(order.paidAt).calendar()}

): (

Order is Not Paid

) }
{/* 3 */}
Deliver to

{order.shippingAddress.address}, {order.shippingAddress.city}, {order.shippingAddress.postalCode}

{ !order.isDelivered ? (

Not Delivered

): (

Delivered at {moment(order.deliveredAt).calendar()}

) }
{ order.orderItems === 0 ? ( Your order is empty ): ( <> { order.orderItems.map((item,index)=>(
{item.name}

QUANTITY

{item.qty}

SUBTOTAL

${item.qty * item.price}
)) } ) }
{/* total */}
Products ${order.itemsPrice}
Shipping ${order.shippingPrice}
Tax ${order.taxPrice}
Total ${order.totalPrice}
) }
); }; export default OrderScreen;
